title: Stable Diffusion â€” AI Tool Review
description: Stable Diffusion is the pioneering open-source image generation model that democratized AI art and powers thousands of creative tools. Stable Diffusion is the open-source image generation model from Stability AI that revolutionized AI art creation. It can run entirely on consumer hardware, enabling private, uncensored, customizable image generation. A massive ecosystem of fine-tuned models (Civitai), UIs (AUTOMATIC1111, ComfyUI), and applications has grown around it. SD3 and SDXL are the latest major versions. Highlights: Completely free and open-source. Runs on consumer GPU. Massive model ecosystem (Civitai). Highly customizable (ControlNet, LoRA). No content restrictions when self-hosted.
